EmailTemplate.subject: DXC & Turbonomic - Automation is the Answer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
In the first month of using Turbonomic, DXC automated decisions around placement, motion, sizing, and configuration saving them over $1.25 Million and delivering greater innovation to their clients.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/dxc-automation-turbonomic-customer-success-story/]]>
"I want to move from thousands to millions of automated decisions as quickly as we can. And both our client and our teams can focus on work that's ultimately going to pay off in business results for the client. So it's win-win every which way you look at it." - Greg Betz, VP Global Operations, DXC
Schedule a Demo <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> and learn how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
